inputs.name: PsFolder
inputs.label: Path to test
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder containing the ps1 or psm1 files to validate

inputs.name: IncludeRules
inputs.label: Rules to include
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pass a comma separated list of rulenames to include. Example: PSAvoidUsingCmdletAliases,PSAvoidUsingWriteHost

inputs.name: ExcludeRules
inputs.label: Rules to exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pass a comma separated list of rulenames to exclude. Example: PSAvoidUsingCmdletAliases,PSAvoidUsingWriteHost

inputs.name: Severity
inputs.label: Severity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Selects rule violations with the specified severity. Valid values are Error, Warning, Information

inputs.name: FailOnError
inputs.label: Fail build on violations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to break build on violations
